g.text: into a folder on the customers machine.
Tiger test environment manager starts all
Tiger proxies (reverse, aggregating, local) will be started.
part of the github repo will be started
The Primärsystem sends requests to the Konnektoren
via the local reverse Tiger proxies.
It follows either manually by human tester or
via test scripts the test work flow
The test work flow has been completed or aborted
all relevant data the TITUS platform needs
for the next steps in the certification process
The ZIP archive is uploaded manually
The local test report contains detailed failure logs

path.id: Installation of openJDK11 and maven.-to-Cloning github repo https://github.com/gematik/tiger-eau-proxy.git\ninto a folder on the customers machine.
Cloning github repo https://github.com/gematik/tiger-eau-proxy.git\ninto a folder on the customers machine.-to-starting Tiger validation suite via\n**mvn -P Test **
starting Tiger validation suite via\n**mvn -P Test **-to-Tiger test environment manager starts all\nTiger proxies (reverse, aggregating, local) will be started.
Tiger test environment manager starts all\nTiger proxies (reverse, aggregating, local) will be started.-to-START

B1-to-The Primärsystem sends requests to the Konnektoren
 via the local reverse Tiger proxies.
 It follows either manually by human tester or
 via test scripts the test work flow
 as specified by Gematik.

The Primärsystem sends requests to the Konnektoren
 via the local reverse Tiger proxies.
 It follows either manually by human tester or
 via test scripts the test work flow
 as specified by Gematik.-to-The test work flow has been completed or aborted
The test work flow has been completed or aborted-to-B2

B1-to-The validation test suite checks
that all requests and responses,
matching the specified work flow
have been received in order
and do match all criteria.

The validation test suite checks
that all requests and responses,
matching the specified work flow
have been received in order
and do match all criteria.-to-**mvn serenity:aggregate serenity:reports**
create a local test report
**mvn serenity:aggregate serenity:reports**\ncreate a local test report-to-#241071

B2-to-**mvn gematik:pack-reports**
 creates a ZIP archive containing
 all relevant data the TITUS platform needs
 for the next steps in the certification process

**mvn gematik:pack-reports**
 creates a ZIP archive containing
 all relevant data the TITUS platform needs
 for the next steps in the certification process-to-The ZIP archive is uploaded manually
to the TITUS platform
The ZIP archive is uploaded manually\nto the TITUS platform-to-The next step in the\ncertification process can be triggered
The next step in the\ncertification process can be triggered-to-end
#241071-to-The local test report contains detailed failure logs
The local test report contains detailed failure logs-to-START
